text: Václav Riedlbauch (1 April 1947 - 3 November 2017) was a Czech composer, pedagogue and manager. He was the Minister of Culture in the government of Jan Fischer (2009–2010).Composer Václav Riedlbauch dead at 70 He was born in Dýšina. He was program director at the Prague Congress Centre. From 2001 until his death, he was the Director General of the Czech Philharmonic. He was a professor at the Academy of Performing Arts in Prague. Riedlbauch died of complications from COPD in Prague on 3 November 2017 at the age of 70.Zemřel Václav Riedlbauch, bývalý ředitel České filharmonie ==References== ==Other websites== * Czech Music Information Centre * Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from COPD Category:Czech academics Category:Czech composers Category:Czech politicians
title: Václav Riedlbauch
